External code and data from Yuan et al. (Nature 2022).
- Technical_noise_test_Leo_SCC_all_tumor_mCherry_K14morethan7_V1.R
- Yuanetal2022_Nature_scRNAseq_jupyternotebook.ipynb

These are kept as reference implementations / QC scripts and are NOT modified.
All new analyses and models live under src/ and notebooks/.
